positive.review: Love the game, beautiful graphics <3 I'm very interested in Abe no Seimei's real historical character, so him as the protagonist makes the game even better. And also I'm studying about Japan, so of course the game's theme is so cool in my opinion.
Mmm idk i think i need to play a lil more

Love the game, beautiful graphics <3 I'm very interested in Abe no Seimei's real historical character, so him as the protagonist makes the game even better. And also I'm studying about Japan, so of course the game's theme is so cool in my opinion.
Budget gamenya ke voice actor, ilustrator, sama pv animator semua.
I just like gacha games with good artstyle
Mmm idk i think i need to play a lil more

negative.review:
"SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
Storage: 2 GB available space"

That's just fake. Client occupies 21+ GB.

Didn't find in-game settings. No fullscreen? Just awful for PC. Maybe that was ok for mobile some years ago, but that's just garbage quality for Steam game.

love the art and super addictive until lvl 15. after its insane... you unlock ~20 different in-game stores and a battle pass, and new shikigami are locked behind paywalls or gated content which prevents progression and kills the fun.
mob
